app_info.name: HomeLinkGH
app_info.subtitle: Trusted Home Services in Ghana
app_info.description:
HomeLinkGH connects Ghanaians worldwide with trusted local service providers. Whether you're living in Ghana or abroad, easily book home services, food delivery, and essential support for yourself or your family.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Home Services: Cleaning, plumbing, electrical work, and repairs
‚Ä¢ Food Delivery: Order from top restaurants and local favorites
‚Ä¢ Diaspora Support: Book services for family back home in Ghana
‚Ä¢ Trusted Providers: Verified and background-checked service professionals
‚Ä¢ Real-time Tracking: Monitor service progress and provider location
‚Ä¢ Secure Payments: Safe and reliable payment processing
‚Ä¢ 24/7 Support: Customer service in English and local languages
‚Ä¢ Multi-language Support: English, Twi, Ga, Ewe, and more

Why Choose HomeLinkGH:
‚úì Ghana's most trusted home services platform
‚úì Rigorous provider verification process
‚úì Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
‚úì Insurance coverage for peace of mind
‚úì Emergency services available
‚úì Support for Ghana cedis and international payments
‚úì Designed specifically for Ghanaian families

Services Available:
‚Ä¢ House Cleaning & Maintenance
‚Ä¢ Plumbing & Electrical Services
‚Ä¢ Food Delivery & Catering
‚Ä¢ Beauty & Personal Care
‚Ä¢ Transportation Services
‚Ä¢ Emergency Home Repairs
‚Ä¢ Elderly Care Support
‚Ä¢ Event Planning & Services

For the Diaspora:
Living abroad but want to help family in Ghana? HomeLinkGH makes it easy to book and pay for services for your loved ones back home. From cleaning services to food delivery, ensure your family is taken care of from anywhere in the world.

Download HomeLinkGH today and experience the convenience of trusted home services in Ghana!

demo_account.notes: This demo account provides access to all app features including booking services, payment processing, and real-time tracking. The account is pre-configured with sample data for comprehensive testing.

app_review_info.review_notes: HomeLinkGH is a legitimate home services platform serving Ghana. All payment processing uses secure third-party providers. Location services are used only for service delivery and provider matching. No inappropriate content or gambling features. App complies with Ghana Data Protection Act and international privacy standards.
app_review_info.additional_info: The app requires location permissions for core functionality (finding nearby service providers and delivery tracking). Payment processing is handled by secure, certified payment gateways. All service providers undergo background verification.

data_collection.deletion_process: Users can request account deletion via delete@homelinkgh.com or in-app settings
